nodes.text: CT-720 was a bounty hunter who once worked with fellow bounty hunters BT-823 and Beilert Valance. Valance was later reminded of his work with CT-720, BT-823, and a few other hunters in a conversation with the former Imperial Cavic sometime prior to the hunt for the Sith Lord Darth Vader by 3 ABY. Cavic called the bounty hunters a "solid bunch."
CT-720 was mentioned in the comic Target Vader 6, which was written by Robbie Thompson and published by Marvel Comics on December 11, 2019.
